name: User Rename by Azed
author: Azed - Cyril Chaniaud

sections.description:
You need to change your login ?

You need to change your nicename (unique slug for your profile) ?

You need to change your display name (the name that you display publicly) ?

User Rename by Azed is made for you !

  • settings define who can use the plugin
  • Administrator can change every user
  • Author / Editor / Contributor ∕ Subscriber can only change their own datas by default
  • Administrator can manage how users roles interact with the plugin (all access / only edit own profile / no access)

  • Auto verify that infos aren’t used by another profile

  • Available in ENGLISH

  • Available in FRENCH
  • .PO available to make your own translation !
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/azeduserrename directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->User Rename by Azed screen to configure the plugin
  4. You can use it !
sections.faq:
Is this plugin easy tu use ?

Yes, we’ve made this plugin as simple as possible to allow any user to use it !

I don’t want subscribers to use this plugin, can i manage it ?

Yes, you can define what each role can do !

Is this plugin free ?

Yes, and for ever !!
sections.changelog:
0.1

This version is the first one ! It has been tested over 50 wordpress !

0.2

Adding some Fam Fam Silk Icons

0.3

0.4

Update image link

short_description: This plugin let you easily and completely rename a user account (login + nicename + display name).
